name: BioChem Emergency Treatment
description: Training in immediate response tactics for exposure to weaponized biological and chemical agents.

cards.title: Field Treatment for Chemical & Bioweapon Exposure
cards.description: Emergency response techniques for rapid decontamination and counteraction of biochem threats.
cards.bulletpoints: Skin decontamination, gas mask usage, rapid chelation protocols

cards.title: Neutralizing Food & Water Poisoning in Crisis Situations
cards.description: Immediate countermeasures for ingesting contaminated food and water in survival scenarios.
cards.bulletpoints: Emergency purging, gastrointestinal binding agents, rapid hydration techniques

cards.title: Surviving Long-Term Exposure to Environmental Biochem Warfare
cards.description: Techniques for mitigating damage from slow-acting bio-accumulative toxins.
cards.bulletpoints: Hormonal repair, immune system restoration, cellular regeneration protocols
